message: Hi there! 👋 I'm Histronaut, your AI history tutor. Ask me anything about history or click one of the suggestions above to get started!

When did the Colombo–Kandy train service first start?
When did the Colombo–Kandy train service first start?
The Colombo-Kandy train service first started in August 1867.
